# Introduce `raps config profile` (create/list/use/delete)

**Labels:** `type:feature`, `prio:high`  
**Milestone:** v0.5 â€” Profiles, Auth, Reliability  
**Epic:** Profiles (contexts) & secrets handling

## Description

Add profile management (`dev`, `prod`, `clientA`, etc.) to enable easy switching between environments and multiple APS apps.

## Acceptance Criteria

- `raps config profile create <name>`
- `raps config profile use <name>`
- `raps config get/set` are profile-aware
- `.env` remains supported, but profile config takes priority when active
- Docs include a "CI example" and "local dev example"

## Notes

Profiles enable developers to manage multiple APS applications and environments (dev, staging, prod) without manual credential switching.
